cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.19.0)
project("nanocui")

set(NANOGUI_BUILD_EXAMPLE ON CACHE BOOL " " FORCE)
set(NANOGUI_BUILD_PYTHON  OFF CACHE BOOL " " FORCE)
set(NANOGUI_INSTALL       OFF CACHE BOOL " " FORCE)
# Add the configurations from nanogui
add_subdirectory(extern/nanogui)
# For reliability of parallel build, make the NanoGUI targets dependencies
set_property(TARGET glfw glfw_objects nanogui PROPERTY FOLDER "dependencies")
# Various preprocessor definitions have been generated by NanoGUI
add_definitions(${NANOGUI_EXTRA_DEFS})
# On top of adding the path to nanogui/include, you may need extras
include_directories(${NANOGUI_EXTRA_INCS})

add_library(nanocui src/nanocui.cpp)
target_link_libraries(nanocui nanogui ${NANOGUI_EXTRA_LIBS})
target_include_directories(nanocui  PRIVATE
	$<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../extern/nanogui/include>)
set_property(TARGET nanocui PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 20)
